parameters.name: Extend
parameters.description: Specifies whether fuzzy search by software name is supported. If you want to use fuzzy search, set the parameter to 1. If you set the parameter to a different value or leave the parameter empty, fuzzy search is not supported.

parameters.name: InstallTimeEnd
parameters.description: The timestamp generated when the software update ends. Unit: milliseconds.

parameters.name: InstallTimeStart
parameters.description: The timestamp generated when the software update starts. Unit: milliseconds.

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description: The number of entries per page. Default value: **10**.

parameters.name: Path
parameters.description: The installation path of the software.

parameters.name: Remark
parameters.description: The name or IP address of the server.
